text: Olin Jeuck Eggen (July 9, 1919 – October 2, 1998) was an American astronomer. Some sources incorrectly give his name as Olin Jenck Eggen. == Other websites == * "A Remembrance of Olin Eggen — 1919–1998" , by Nicholas Suntzeff, 6 October 1998; NOAO Newsletter, No. 56, December 1998. * "Eggen Takes the Papers" , by Nick Kollerstrom, Neptune's Discovery: The British Case for Co- Prediction, Science and Technology Studies, University College London. * "The Case of the Pilfered Planet", by William Sheehan, Nicholas Kollerstrom, and Craig B. Waff, Scientific American.com, December 2004. === Obituaries === * BAAS 32 (2000), 1661 (obituary) Category:1919 births Category:1998 deaths Category:American astronomers Category:Scientists from Wisconsin
title: Olin J. Eggen
